audioText: Elle sortira de la maison très tôt demain matin pour commencer sa routine d'exercice.
question: When will she leave the house tomorrow?
options: Very early in the morning to start her exercise routine
Late in the evening after finishing work
In the afternoon for a shopping trip
Around noon for a lunch meeting
explanation: The text states 'Elle sortira de la maison très tôt demain matin pour commencer sa routine d'exercice' - She will leave the house very early tomorrow morning to start her exercise routine. 'Sortira' is the third person singular future form of 'sortir' (to go out/leave).
